unnormalised: My cousin, a software engineer at TCS, says their team still uses legacy systems written in VB6. Imagine debugging that! Apparently, they're planning a migration to .NET in Q3 2024.
normalised: My cousin, a software engineer at T-C-S, says their team still uses legacy systems written in V-B-six. Imagine debugging that! Apparently, they are planning a migration to dot N-E-T in Q-three two thousand and twenty four.
